root.name: Brothers in Arms: Hour of Heroes
root.description: Controls The controls are adapted to the iPhone in a way that it feels exactly like you are playing on a console game. An orange ring with an orange dot in the middle controls like an analog stick while you use your finger to look and shoot. To use grenades all you need to do is shake the phone forward. Size81.6mb
